name: Tantal
description:
Tantal is a cunning collector who dreams of collecting coins and crystals. In the game you collect coins, crystals and solve crystal puzzles.

The game takes place in the "T" world!
Tantal is obsessed with finding rare crystals and loves to solve logic problems.

Game features:
  • Fast travel
  • Solving puzzles like in a match 3 game)
  • Collect coins, everyone loves coins
  • Collecting crystals
  • Puzzles through the mechanics of the game three in a row
  • Limited number of moves

A - The number of points scored.
B - The number of moves left.
C - The number of points required to move to a new level.
